titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of Representative Thomas P. "Tip" O'Neill, Jr.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
DEBATE - At the conclusion of one hour of debate, unanimous consent was granted for an additional one hour period of debate on the resolution under consideration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/25/1994--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Thomas P. "Tip" O'Neill, Jr., from Massachusetts.
